name: Magic UI
description: Animated React components and effects for landing pages, built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

components.name: animated-beam
components.description: Animated light beam that travels along SVG paths. Used to visualize connections or integrations between UI elements.

from.description: Source element for the beam line.

to.description: Target element for the beam line.

components.useCase: Connecting two elements with a moving beam, good for explaining data flow.
components.embeddingContext: Animated Beam creates a light beam animation traveling along an SVG path between elements. Also known as: connection line, integration beam, flow animation, path animation. Used to showcase integrations, data flow, or connections between icons/logos. Features customizable gradient colors and animation speed. Common in landing pages showing service integrations.

components.name: animated-list
components.description: List with staggered entrance animations for each item.

examples.title: Feature List
examples.code:
<AnimatedList>
  <AnimatedListItem>Type-safe components</AnimatedListItem>
  <AnimatedListItem>Framer Motion animations</AnimatedListItem>
  <AnimatedListItem>Perfect for landing pages</AnimatedListItem>
</AnimatedList>

components.useCase: A list where new items animate in, perfect for activity feeds.
components.embeddingContext: List with staggered entrance animations for each item. Related concepts: list, notification, feed, stagger. Primary use case: A list where new items animate in, perfect for activity feeds.

components.name: bento-grid
components.description: Grid layout component for creating visually interesting feature sections with varying cell sizes.

cols.description: Number of columns in the grid.

examples.title: Marketing Bento Grid
examples.code:
<BentoGrid cols={3}>
  <BentoCard title="Fast" description="Optimized animations." />
  <BentoCard title="Beautiful" description="Thoughtful motion design." />
  <BentoCard title="Copy-paste" description="Drop into any Next.js app." />
</BentoGrid>

components.useCase: A bento-style grid for featuring multiple items of varying importance.
components.embeddingContext: Bento Grid creates a modern layout with cards of varying sizes, similar to the Apple iOS bento design. Also known as: feature grid, mosaic layout, dashboard grid, card grid. Allows flexible arrangements with some cells spanning multiple rows or columns. Perfect for showcasing features, stats, or portfolio items in a visually engaging way.

components.name: blur-in
components.description: Text that blurs in on mount or when scrolled into view.
components.useCase: Text that reveals itself by unblurring.
components.embeddingContext: Text that blurs in on mount or when scrolled into view. Related concepts: text, reveal, blur, animation. Primary use case: Text that reveals itself by unblurring.

components.name: border-beam
components.description: Animated border beam that moves around the edges of a container.

examples.title: Highlighted Card
examples.code: Border Beam

components.useCase: A beam of light traveling around a container's border.
components.embeddingContext: Animated border beam that moves around the edges of a container. Related concepts: border, light, glow, card. Primary use case: A beam of light traveling around a container's border.

components.name: box-reveal
components.description: Content reveals from inside a box with a masking animation.
components.useCase: Revealing content with a sliding box mask effect.
components.embeddingContext: Content reveals from inside a box with a masking animation. Related concepts: reveal, mask, text, animation. Primary use case: Revealing content with a sliding box mask effect.

components.name: confetti
components.description: Celebratory confetti animation triggered by an event.
components.useCase: Firing confetti on success states or celebrations.
components.embeddingContext: Celebratory confetti animation triggered by an event. Related concepts: celebration, particles, success, effect. Primary use case: Firing confetti on success states or celebrations.

components.name: dock
components.description: macOS-inspired dock component with magnification and smooth spring animations. Similar to Aceternity floating dock.

examples.title: Floating Dock
examples.code:
<Dock>
  <DockIcon icon={<HomeIcon />} label="Home" href="#home" />
  <DockIcon icon={<UserIcon />} label="Profile" href="#profile" />
</Dock>

components.useCase: An icon dock that expands on hover, like macOS.
components.embeddingContext: Dock is a macOS-inspired navigation component with magnification effects. Also known as: app dock, icon bar, mac dock, floating navigation. Features smooth spring physics and hover magnification for a native desktop feel. Icons scale up organically when hovered. Used for app launchers, quick navigation, or action bars.

components.name: marquee
components.description: Infinite horizontal or vertical scrolling component for content like logos, testimonials, or news tickers.

children.description: Content to scroll inside the marquee.

speed.description: Time in seconds for a full loop.

examples.title: Basic Text Marquee
examples.code: Super smooth UI animations Built with Magic UI

examples.title: Logo Marquee

components.useCase: Infinite scrolling strip for logos or text.
components.embeddingContext: Marquee creates an infinite scrolling effect for content. Also known as: ticker, carousel, infinite scroll, logo scroll, news ticker. Scrolls content horizontally or vertically in a loop. Features customizable speed, direction, and pause-on-hover. Common uses: client logos, testimonials, news headlines, or social proof sections.

components.name: shimmer-button
components.description: Button with an animated shimmer effect around its border. Eye-catching call-to-action button.
components.useCase: A shiny, premium-looking button.
components.embeddingContext: Shimmer Button features an animated shimmering light effect around its perimeter. Also known as: glowing button, animated CTA, sparkle button, highlight button. Creates an eye-catching effect that draws user attention. The shimmer travels around the border like liquid metal. Perfect for primary CTAs, sign-up buttons, or featured actions.
